ygData.subject: Soft Cap on Resists (was: Patch Message)
ygData.msgSnippet: I understand that.  It just seems that when I see people running from a dragon, they are in the bardless groups.  Of course I don t know what their resists
ygData.messageBody:
I understand that. It just seems that when I see people running from
a dragon, they are in the bardless groups. Of course I don't know
what their resists were at. But that isn't important. What I really
want to know is how extensively has anyone tested this? Or is this
soft cap stuff all just hearsay from a friend of a friend that works
for Verant?

But you know, I don't think that this is a real threat anyway since
we are the ones that will push everyone over 175.

~Beatdrop


--- In eqbards@y..., Jeffrey Sue <jsue@r...> wrote:
> the point was not that you would be feared or ae damaged or
whatever. the point
> was that you would get the same effectivity at about 175 as at
about 245.
>
> the way to test this is to have someone get to about 176 in resists
and compare
> effectivity with someone at 245 in resists.
>
>
>
>
> At 06:50 PM 2/22/01 +0000, you wrote:
> >Sorry Sylly, my question was mainly for the group. I was agreeing
> >with you. Every dragon/resist necessary encounter that I've been
to,
> >I have never been feared, resist gravity fluxed, taken minimal
> >damage, etc. I was just wondering why people are talking about
this
> >soft resist cap. This is the first place that I've heard of it.
And
> >I was joking about the bard conspiracy.
> >
> >~Beatdrop Battledrum
> >
> >
> >--- In eqbards@y..., James Schuldes <jgs@s...> wrote:
> > > I don't understand your question (soft cap? uber-guild
conspiracy?)
> >but I
> > > have been on raids, very recently, and have seen first hand
where
> >the bard
> > > resist songs makes a significant difference. And this is not a
one
> >time
> > > observation.
> > >
> > > Sylly
> > >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: beatdropbattledrum@h...
> > > [mailto:beatdropbattledrum@h...]
> > > Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 5:33 PM
> > > To: eqbards@y...
> > > Subject: [eqbards] Re: Patch Message
> > >
> > >
> > > Has this soft cap on resists been confirmed? Or are we just
> >relying
> > > on this uberguild leader that may have a conspiracy against
bards?
> > > LOL!
> > >
> > > ~Beatdrop Battledrum
> > >
> > >
> > > --- In eqbards@y..., James Schuldes <jgs@s...> wrote:
> > > > Not true in my experience. Bard songs that buff resists do
still
> > > make a
> > > > difference.
> > > >
> > > > Sylly
